titleStmt.title: The cordiall of Mr. David Ienkins: or His reply to H.P. barrester of Lincolnes-Inne, answered.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head.,

notesStmt.note: A reply, by Henry Parker, to: Jenkins, David. The cordiall of Judge Jenkins, for the good people of London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head.
